title: Dua for Protection from Shirk
bangla: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika an ushrika bika wa ana a'lamu, wa astaghfiruka lima la a'lamu.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ أَنْ أُشْرِكَ بِكَ وَأَنَا أَعْلَمُ، وَأَسْتَغْفِرُكَ لِمَا لَا أَعْلَمُ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika an ushrika bika wa ana a'lamu, wa astaghfiruka lima la a'lamu.
meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from associating partners with You knowingly, and I seek Your forgiveness for what I do unknowingly.

title: Dua for Increase in Provision
bangla: Allahumma-ghfirli, warhamni, wahdini, warzuqni.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي، وَارْحَمْنِي، وَاهْدِنِي، وَارْزُقْنِي
transliteration: Allahumma-ghfirli, warhamni, wahdini, warzuqni.
meaning: O Allah, forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, and grant me provision.

title: Dua for Good Character
bangla: Allahumma ahsanta khalqi fa ahsin khuluqi.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَحْسَنْتَ خَلْقِي فَأَحْسِنْ خُلُقِي
transliteration: Allahumma ahsanta khalqi fa ahsin khuluqi.
meaning: O Allah, as You have made my external features beautiful, make my character beautiful as well.

title: Dua for Protection from Debt
bangla: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-ma'thami wal-maghrami.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْمَأْثَمِ وَالْمَغْرَمِ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-ma'thami wal-maghrami.
meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from sin and heavy debt.

title: Dua for Knowledge and Understanding
bangla: Rabbi zidni 'ilma.
arabic: رَبِّ زِدْنِي عِلْمًا
transliteration: Rabbi zidni 'ilma.
meaning: My Lord, increase me in knowledge.

title: Dua for Protection from Hypocrisy
bangla: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min 'ilmin la yanfa'u, wa min qalbin la yakhsha'u, wa min nafsin la tashba'u, wa min du'atin la yustajabu laha.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عِلْمٍ لَا يَنْفَعُ، وَمِنْ قَلْبٍ لَا يَخْشَعُ، وَمِنْ نَفْسٍ لَا تَشْبَعُ، وَمِنْ دُعَاءٍ لَا يُسْتَجَابُ لَهُ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min 'ilmin la yanfa'u, wa min qalbin la yakhsha'u, wa min nafsin la tashba'u, wa min du'atin la yustajabu laha.
meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from knowledge that does not benefit, from a heart that does not fear, from a soul that is not satisfied, and from a supplication that is not answered.

title: Dua for Blessings in Wealth
bangla: Allahumma barik lana fi ma razaqtana wa qina 'adhaban-nar.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِيمَا رَزَقْتَنَا وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
transliteration: Allahumma barik lana fi ma razaqtana wa qina 'adhaban-nar.
meaning: O Allah, bless us in what You have provided for us and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.

title: Dua for Protection from Evil Desires
bangla: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min sharri nafsi wa min sharri shaytanin wa shirkihi.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ نَفْسِي وَمِنْ شَرِّ الشَّيْطَانِ وَشِرْكِهِ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min sharri nafsi wa min sharri shaytanin wa shirkihi.
meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from the evil of my soul and from the evil of Satan and his partners.

title: Dua for Success in Affairs
bangla: Rabbi yassir wala tu'assir, wa tamim bil-khair.
arabic: رَبِّ يَسِّرْ وَلَا تُعَسِّرْ، وَتَمِّمْ بِالْخَيْرِ
transliteration: Rabbi yassir wala tu'assir, wa tamim bil-khair.
meaning: My Lord, make things easy and do not make them difficult, and complete this affair with good.

title: Dua for Protection from Worry
bangla: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazan.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazan.
meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from worry and grief.

title: Dua for Strong Faith
bangla: Rabbana la tuzigh quloobana ba'da idh hadaitana wa hab lana min ladunka rahmah.
arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا وَهَبْ لَنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً
transliteration: Rabbana la tuzigh quloobana ba'da idh hadaitana wa hab lana min ladunka rahmah.
meaning: Our Lord, let not our hearts deviate after You have guided us and grant us from Yourself mercy.

title: Dua for Protection from Trials
bangla: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min fitnatid-dunya wa 'adhabil-qabr.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ فِتْنَةِ الدُّنْيَا وَعَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min fitnatid-dunya wa 'adhabil-qabr.
meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from the trials of this world and the punishment of the grave.

title: Dua for Gratitude
bangla: Allahumma a'inni 'ala dhikrika wa shukrika wa husni 'ibadatika.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَعِنِّي عَلَىٰ ذِكْرِكَ وَشُكْرِكَ وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِكَ
transliteration: Allahumma a'inni 'ala dhikrika wa shukrika wa husni 'ibadatika.
meaning: O Allah, help me to remember You, to thank You, and to worship You in an excellent manner.

title: Dua for Protection from Laziness
bangla: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-'ajzi wal-kasali.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-'ajzi wal-kasali.
meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from incapacity and laziness.

title: Dua for Good Ending
bangla: Allahumma inni as'aluka husnal khatimah.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ حُسْنَ الْخَاتِمَةِ
transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka husnal khatimah.
meaning: O Allah, I ask You for a good end.

title: Dua for Protection from Miserliness
bangla: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-bukhli.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْبُخْلِ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-bukhli.
meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from miserliness.

title: Dua for Guidance to Right Path
bangla: Rabbana atina min ladunka rahmah wa hayyi' lana min amrina rashada.
arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً وَهَيِّئْ لَنَا مِنْ أَمْرِنَا رَشَدًا
transliteration: Rabbana atina min ladunka rahmah wa hayyi' lana min amrina rashada.
meaning: Our Lord, grant us from Yourself mercy and prepare for us from our affair right guidance.

title: Dua for Protection from Cowardice
bangla: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-jubni.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْجُبْنِ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-jubni.
meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from cowardice.

title: Dua for Acceptance of Deeds
bangla: Allahumma taqabbal minna salatana wa siyamana wa qiyamana wa ruku'ana wa sujudana.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ تَقَبَّلْ مِنَّا صَلَاتَنَا وَصِيَامَنَا وَقِيَامَنَا وَرُكُوعَنَا وَسُجُودَنَا
transliteration: Allahumma taqabbal minna salatana wa siyamana wa qiyamana wa ruku'ana wa sujudana.
meaning: O Allah, accept from us our prayer, our fasting, our standing in prayer, our bowing, and our prostration.

title: Dua for Protection from Oppression
bangla: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min zulmi wal-mazlumi.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ ظُلْمِي وَمَظْلُومِي
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min zulmi wal-mazlumi.
meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from oppressing others and from being oppressed.
